doc:
Lola Albright https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lola_Albright 0 Lola Jean Albright (July 20, 1924 – March 23, 2017) was an American singer and actress, best known for playing the sultry singer Edie Hart, the girlfriend of private eye Peter Gunn, on all three seasons of the TV series Peter Gunn. Lola_Jean_Albright ( July_20_,_1924 – March_23_,_2017 ) was an_American_singer_and_actress , best_known for playing the_sultry_singer_Edie_Hart , the_girlfriend of private_eye_Peter_Gunn , on all_three_seasons of the_TV_series_Peter_Gunn .
